module: Module-level comment: The 'signal_pass_through' module serially passes data on 'data_bit' input synchronized by two clock domains ('sclk1' and 'sclk2'). It handles bit-level processing, output control signal toggling ('cs1', 'cs0', 'ldac'), and provides visual state output on LEDs. The module uses internal shift registers for serial-to-parallel conversion of input data and controls the data flow sequence and data transfer to the output datasets.
